medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has undergone multiple regimens of chemotherapy complicated by local recurrence and lymph node metastases. The precise onset of the current symptoms is not specified, but the patient has a complex history of pancreatic adenocarcinoma and experiences various symptoms likely related to this condition and its treatments.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma, Chemotherapy-Induced Neuropathy, GERD
